about_the_game:
Interesting puzzle line game
There are three ways to play the game:
1. Constellation connection.
2. In fragment mode, you drag the right fragment to form a complete image.
3. Huarong Road mode, you need to complete the complete image bit by bit according to the space position.
Game features:
When you do the jigsaw, there will be a percentage progress. When the progress reaches a certain level, the corresponding changes will be made to the pictures you spell, and the more difficult Huarong Road mode will unlock the large pictures into the favorites.
Favorites:
You can see the big picture of Huarong Road mode unlocking, enjoy it.

content_descriptors.notes: There are some female characters with exposed clothes, but no nudity.

3. Huarong Road mode, you need to complete the complete image bit by bit according to the space position.

When you do the jigsaw, there will be a percentage progress. When the progress reaches a certain level, the corresponding changes will be made to the pictures you spell, and the more difficult Huarong Road mode will unlock the large pictures into the favorites.

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: macOS Sierra
  • Processor: Intel Core-i3 or faster processor
  • Memory: 500 MB RAM
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: macOS Catalina
  • Processor: Intel Core-i5 or faster processor
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Storage: 2 GB available space

name: Signs of Zodiac

  • Processor: Intel Core-i3 or faster processor

pc_requirements.recommended:

  • Storage: 2 GB available space

short_description: Simple rest puzzle line game You just need to move your finger to unlock the beautiful constellation No special background story, just simple jigsaw and appreciation Relax yourself
supported_languages:
English*, Simplified Chinese*
*languages with full audio support
